## Usage

```{r}
library(EDMAinR)

file1 <- system.file("extdata/crouzon/Crouzon_P0_Global_MUT.xyz",
    package="EDMAinR")
x1 <- read_xyz(file1)
x1

file2 <- system.file("extdata/crouzon/Crouzon_P0_Global_NON-MUT.xyz",
    package="EDMAinR")
x2 <- read_xyz(file2)
x2

B <- 9

fit <- edma_fit(x1, B=B)
fit
```
